meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leslie Gordon Thomas Phillips Jose Garriga Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7016.

td.p: Leslie Gordon, a market research analyst originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Thomas Phillips, a graduate student originally from Greenville, Alabama
Jose Garriga, a communications specialist from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $38,402)

tr.td: MAY THE FORK BE WITH YOU
LITERARY CHARCTERS
SHOW BIZ STUPID ANSWERS
IT BORDERS BRAZIL
MANY "DO"
BUT NOT CHILLY
